## BaseDatamodel class

The base-datamodel defines attributes which every document in the database has in common

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default class BaseDatamodel implements iBaseDatamodel 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [iBaseDatamodel](./clm-core.ibasedatamodel.md)

## Remarks

Every instance of the base-datamodel (db -<!-- -->&gt; application layer) should contain standard methods

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(payload)](./clm-core.basedatamodel._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>BaseDatamodel</code> class |

|  [updatedAt](./clm-core.basedatamodel.updatedat.md) |  | Date |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [beforeInsert()](./clm-core.basedatamodel.beforeinsert.md) |  | Execute steps before the document will be inserted. Will be executed by [BaseDAO](./clm-core.basedao.md) and should not be executed by it's own. Similar to mongoose pre-save-hook |
|  [beforeUpdate(payload)](./clm-core.basedatamodel.beforeupdate.md) |  | Execute steps before the document has been updated. Will be executed by [BaseDAO](./clm-core.basedao.md) and should not be executed by it's own. The 'updateAt' attribute of the document will be changed by default. Similar to mongoose pre-update-hook |
|  [executeAfterCreateDependencies()](./clm-core.basedatamodel.executeaftercreatedependencies.md) |  | Execute steps after the document has been created. Will be executed by [BaseDAO](./clm-core.basedao.md)<!-- -->. and should not be executed by it's own. Similar to mongoose post-save-hook |
|  [executeAfterDeleteDependencies()](./clm-core.basedatamodel.executeafterdeletedependencies.md) |  | Execute steps after the document has been deleted. Will be executed by [BaseDAO](./clm-core.basedao.md)<!-- -->. and should not be executed by it's own. Similar to mongoose post-delete-hook |
